text: tene ja akasa manthi pani varasavyum, pachi potapotana vistara pramane nahero vahi ga'i, pachi panina vahenana karane uparana bhage phina utpanna thava lagyum, jevi rite gharena tatha vasano sapha karati vakhate phina ubhara'i ave che, avi ja rite allaha ta'ala satya ane asatyanum udaharana ape che, have phina vyartha tha'i khatama tha'i jaya che, parantu je lokone phayado apanari vastu che te dharatimam rahi jaya che, allaha ta'ala avi ja rite udaharanonum varnana kare che
